Package com.meme

Class ProgramInterface

java.lang.Object
com.meme.ProgramInterface
public class ProgramInterface
extends java.lang.Object
This class is responsible of the program interface which is responsible of displaying program's important functions and forms

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ProgramInterface()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void displayBookingForm​(Playground playground)
    This function displays the booking form when a player user wants to book a specific playground it takes inputs for booking details like start and end time and stores them in booking list
    void displayPlayground()
    this function displays the playgrounds list when a user wants to book a playground it takes inputs for the chosen playground's id and checks if such a playground exists
    void displayPlaygroundOwnerBookings()
    This function displays the playground owner's bookings list, it also checks if there are bookings or not.
    void displayPlaygroundOwnerPlaygrounds()
    This function displays the playground owner's playgrounds list, it also checks if there are playgrounds or not.
    void displayPlaygroundRegisterationForm()
    this function displays the playground registration form for the playground owner to register his playgrounds it takes inputs for playground's details and stores them in playgrounds menu/list
    void displayUserMenu()
    This function displays user main menu for users it asks the user if he wants to logout of the system or to view/book his playgrounds or to display his bookings and then continues the process of the rest of the functions when he chooses what he wants to do
    void loginForm()
    this function displays the login form when a user(whether a playground owner or a player) wants to login in the system it takes inputs for user's details like his id and password and checks if they are right
    void run()
    this function is responsible of running the whole system where the whole system starts by implementing this function in the main function
    void userRegisterationForm()
    this function displays the user registration form when a user(whether a playground owner or a player) wants to register in the system it takes inputs for user's details and stores them in users' menu/list

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ProgramInterface

      public ProgramInterface()

  • Method Details

    • displayPlaygroundRegisterationForm

      public void displayPlaygroundRegisterationForm()
      this function displays the playground registration form for the playground owner to register his playgrounds it takes inputs for playground's details and stores them in playgrounds menu/list

    • userRegisterationForm

      public void userRegisterationForm()
      this function displays the user registration form when a user(whether a playground owner or a player) wants to register in the system it takes inputs for user's details and stores them in users' menu/list

    • displayBookingForm

      public void displayBookingForm​(Playground playground)
      This function displays the booking form when a player user wants to book a specific playground it takes inputs for booking details like start and end time and stores them in booking list
      Parameters:
      playground - of type (Playground) in order to choose which playground the player wants to book

    • displayPlayground

      public void displayPlayground()
      this function displays the playgrounds list when a user wants to book a playground it takes inputs for the chosen playground's id and checks if such a playground exists

    • loginForm

      public void loginForm()
      this function displays the login form when a user(whether a playground owner or a player) wants to login in the system it takes inputs for user's details like his id and password and checks if they are right

    • displayPlaygroundOwnerBookings

      public void displayPlaygroundOwnerBookings()
      This function displays the playground owner's bookings list, it also checks if there are bookings or not. if there are bookings , this function gives the playground owner the ability to accept or to deny the booking he chooses.

    • displayUserMenu

      public void displayUserMenu()
      This function displays user main menu for users it asks the user if he wants to logout of the system or to view/book his playgrounds or to display his bookings and then continues the process of the rest of the functions when he chooses what he wants to do

    • displayPlaygroundOwnerPlaygrounds

      public void displayPlaygroundOwnerPlaygrounds()
      This function displays the playground owner's playgrounds list, it also checks if there are playgrounds or not. if there are playgrounds , it just displays them. else, it gives him error message that he hasn't registered playgrounds yet

    • run

      public void run()
      this function is responsible of running the whole system where the whole system starts by implementing this function in the main function
